thread.title: Karthick Kumar says Suchithra twitter account hacked - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Karthick Kumar says Suchithra twitter account hacked - Tamil Movie News

title: Karthick Kumar says Suchithra twitter account hacked - Tamil Movie News
text: Thiru Thiru Thuru Thuru directors second project dropped As we reported earlier, there were tweets published from singer Suchithra account accusing Dhanush and his team of attacking her, also a still showing an injured hand. There were also other statements about a sex scandal in Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev Ashram in Coimbator and that Suchi confirming that she and husband Karthick Kumar are divorcing. ALSO READ: Is Suchithra making false accusations against Dhanush? and Suchi-Karthick the next celebrity couple to split? Yesterday Karthick Kumar had tweeted that there were no factual basis for Suchithra’s activities on twitter and that some other personal issues are there. ALSO READ : Karthik Kumar clarifies about Suchithra's controversial tweets Today the ‘Yaradi Nee Mohini’ actor has come out with a new clarification stating that Suchi’s twitter account has been hacked.
